title: Chelsea Handler_ My Horizontal Life_ MP3
description:
Chelsea's first book which is read by actress and director Cassandra Campbell
***********************************************************

My Horizontal Life: A Collection of One-Night Stands.
First Sentence:
I WAS SEVEN years old when my sister told me she'd give me five dollars to run upstairs into my parents' room while they were having sex and take a picture.

"There are other funny stories included in this book that, while hilarious - ... waking up on someone's couch after a Halloween party, getting locked out of said apartment and having to walk home and break into her own apartment while still wearing her M&M's costume from the night before - they're not about one-night stands or anything remotely sexual."            
                                 - Stephanie Sims - Celebrity News Service Reporter
